Package lib.graphs

Class CustomNetwork<T>

java.lang.Object
lib.graphs.Graph<T>
lib.graphs.Network<T>
lib.graphs.CustomNetwork<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of elements stored in the network
All Implemented Interfaces:
CustomNetworkADT<T>, GraphADT<T>, NetworkADT<T>
public class CustomNetwork<T>
extends Network<T>
implements CustomNetworkADT<T>
The CustomNetwork class represents a customizable network structure that extends the functionality of a generic Network class. It allows for specialized operations on graph data by implementing the CustomNetworkADT interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomNetwork

      public CustomNetwork()
      Default constructor for the CustomNetwork class. Initializes a new instance of CustomNetwork by invoking the parent class's constructor. The CustomNetwork class is a specialized extension of the Network class, tailored for handling custom data and connections.

  • Method Details

    • getConnectedVertices

      public ArrayUnorderedList<T> getConnectedVertices​(T vertex)
      Retrieves a list of vertices that are directly connected to the specified vertex in the graph. A connection exists if an edge between the given vertex and another vertex has a weight that is not equal to positive infinity.
      Specified by:
      getConnectedVertices in interface CustomNetworkADT<T>
      Parameters:
      vertex - the vertex for which connected vertices are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      an ArrayUnorderedList<T> containing all vertices directly connected to the specified vertex
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified vertex is not found in the graph

    • getRoom

      public Room getRoom​(java.lang.String name)
      Retrieves a Room object from the graph with the specified name. The method iterates through the vertices of the graph and checks if a vertex corresponds to a Room with the given name.
      Specified by:
      getRoom in interface CustomNetworkADT<T>
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Room to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Room object with the specified name, or null if no such Room is found

    • getVertices

      public ArrayUnorderedList<T> getVertices()
      Retrieves a list of all vertices present in the graph.
      Specified by:
      getVertices in interface CustomNetworkADT<T>
      Returns:
      an ArrayUnorderedList<T> containing all vertices in the graph
